grammar.description: The relative file path to the .langium grammar file

fileExtensions.description: The file extensions used by the DSL

languageId.description: The Id used to refer to the DSL

out.description: The relative directory to the code generated by the langium-cli

textMate.description: An object to describe the textMate grammar properties

out.description: The output file path to the generated textMate grammar

chevrotainParserConfig.description: An object to describe the Chevrotain parser configuration

recoveryEnabled.description: Is the error recovery / fault tolerance of the Chevrotain Parser enabled

maxLookahead.description: Maximum number of tokens the parser will use to choose between alternatives

dynamicTokensEnabled.description: A flag to support Dynamically defined Tokens

nodeLocationTracking.description: Enable computation of CST nodes location

traceInitPerf.description: A flag to print performance tracing logs during parser initialization

skipValidations.description: A flag to avoid running the grammar validations during Parser initialization

langiumInternal.description: A flag to determine whether langium uses itself to bootstrap
